publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-223 Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations to Scottish Under-20 Football Team—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish under-20 football team will be taking part in the under-20 World Cup finals in Canada in July 2007; congratulates the squad on the momentous achievement of reaching the finals as one of the few European teams at the world cup; further congratulates the Scotland coach, Tommy Wilson, for his inspirational training and success in building on the excellent performance of the under-19 team at the 2006 under-19 European Championships, and wishes the whole Scottish team every success in its matches in Canada in July. Supported by: Elizabeth Smith*, Stuart McMillan*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Kidd*, Charlie Gordon*, Mike Rumbles*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Ian McKee*, Alasdair Allan*, Mike Pringle*, George Foulkes*, John Lamont*, Gavin Brown*, Murdo Fraser*, Gil Paterson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Jackie Baillie*, Jim Hume*, James Kelly*, Trish Godman*, Bill Aitken*

S3M-223 Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations to Scottish Under-20 Football Team—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish under-20 football team will be taking part in the under-20 World Cup finals in Canada in July 2007; congratulates the squad on the momentous achievement of reaching the finals as one of the few European teams at the world cup; further congratulates the Scotland coach, Tommy Wilson, for his inspirational training and success in building on the excellent performance of the under-19 team at the 2006 under-19 European Championships, and wishes the whole Scottish team every success in its matches in Canada in July. Supported by: Elizabeth Smith, Stuart McMillan, Nanette Milne, Bill Kidd, Charlie Gordon, Mike Rumbles, Mr Frank McAveety, Ian McKee, Alasdair Allan, Mike Pringle, George Foulkes, John Lamont, Gavin Brown, Murdo Fraser, Gil Paterson, Mr Jamie Stone, Jackie Baillie, Jim Hume, James Kelly, Trish Godman, Bill Aitken, Hugh Henry*, Margaret Mitchell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jackson Carlaw*
S3M-223 Congratulations to Scottish Under-20 Football Team (lodged on 21 June 2007) John Scott*, Hugh O’Donnell*, John Park*
S3M-223 Congratulations to Scottish Under-20 Football Team (lodged on 21 June 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*, Michael McMahon*
S3M-223 Congratulations to Scottish Under-20 Football Team (lodged on 21 June 2007) Jack McConnell*, David Whitton*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-223 Congratulations to Scottish Under-20 Football Team (lodged on 21 June 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
